column4: when ./configure kxdocker, i get this error: checking for KDE... configure: error: in the prefix, you've chosen, are no KDE headers installed. This will fail. So, check this please and use another prefix! I do not know what this is refering to.
Run sudo make install, or (even better) use checkinstall instead
Not necessary but highly recommended if you want to remove this software later and don't want to keep the install files around.
